name: Next To You
description:
I wish I had more time to add more levels which I might do later but I'm not free for Monday.  Might update long term. Really just a prototype game. Fits the theme through there being two sides in this battle. (I know it's a stretch but I started the game and then realized the jam was on)

WebGL Build: https://collapsedcoding.itch.io/nexttoyouwebgl
